scripts.ganache: start cmd /k npx ganache --wallet.totalAccounts=10 --wallet.defaultBalance=1000 --port=7545 --chain.chainId=1337 --wallet.mnemonic="trash meat globe gasp path detect gain lounge cotton learn talk police"
scripts.deploy: cd TRIINL && node rmvDeploy.js &&  npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/TRINLL.ts  --network Ganache && node enderecoDeploy.js
